## ğŸš€ Quick Start Commands

```bash
# Setup (first time only)
cd frontend
npm install
npm run dev                    # Terminal 1: Frontend on localhost:5173

# In another terminal
cd pocketbase
./pocketbase serve           # Terminal 2: Backend on localhost:8090

# Visit
# Frontend: http://localhost:5173
# Backend Admin: http://127.0.0.1:8090/_/
```

## ğŸ¤– Using GitHub Copilot

### Copilot Will Generate:

âœ… Components matching project style
âœ… Hooks following established patterns
âœ… TypeScript types (strict mode)
âœ… TailwindCSS classes
âœ… PocketBase queries
âœ… Real-time subscriptions

### How to Ask:

```
"Create a component like FactsheetList.tsx that shows [description]"
"Add a hook similar to useRealtime that [purpose]"
"Generate TypeScript interface extending RecordModel with [fields]"
"Following copilot-instructions.md, create [feature]"
```

### Best Practices:

* Reference similar existing code
* Share type definitions
* Point to pattern examples
* Include error messages
* Be specific about requirements
